title: Ty Cobb 1907 Detroit Tigers team RPPC SOLD
author: T206Jim

posts.post_title: Ty Cobb 1907 Detroit Tigers team RPPC SOLD
posts.post_content:
1907 RPPC of the Detroit Tigers featuring Cobb in his first full season.  Deeper black and white contrast than most copies with nice clarity.  This copy was posted in 1908 from the World Series as mentioned on the back.  Sold.

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=310239&d=1522114828[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=310240&d=1522114838[/IMG]
